required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anatomic Altas of the Whole Human Body
clinical_study.official_title: Anatomic Altas of the Whole Human Body

brief_summary.textblock:
The goal is the constitution of a statistical atlas of the human being morphology variability.
This work would be a significant step forward in the field of anatomy and biomechanical simulation.

primary_outcome.measure: Constitution of a statistical atlas of the full human body

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers between the ages of 18 and 99 years.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Respiratory and cardiovascular pathology
- Claustrophobia
- Counter-argument to magnetic field exposure

reference.citation: Palombi O, Ulliana F, Favier V, Léon JC, Rousset MC. My Corporis Fabrica: an ontology-based tool for reasoning and querying on complex anatomical models. J Biomed Semantics. 2014 May 6;5:20. doi: 10.1186/2041-1480-5-20. eCollection 2014.
